summary:
Principal researcher/dev in radiotherapy, diagnostic imaging, machine learning/AI, and medical physics.

15+ years experience in medical imaging, signal processing, biomedical modeling, machine learning; software and hardware development. Cum laude PhD in medical physics & radiotherapy; Experience in busy clinics, academia, multidisciplinary teams, and biomedical industry.

Equipment calibration (detectors, dosimeters, and phantom irradiation), for various therapy modalities (IMRT, VMAT, brachy). EPID, gafchromic film, Matrixx, and ion chambers. 

Radiotherapy treatment planning software (Varian Eclipse, Oncentra Masterplan, Raysearch), also for small animals (SmART Plan).  

MATLAB, python, C++, CUDA, jupyter, javascript, VBscript, and development tools; git, cmake, doxygen, etc.  Preference for open source, linux or cross platform software.

Development with machine learning, tensorflow, keras, and several image processing or general packages ITK, VTK, openCV, numPy, sciPy, pandas, and on several platforms, AWS, Azure, rescale, and local condor cluster.

Physics simulation via finite element; COMSOL Multiphysics (RF module), openFOAM, and Monte Carlo; Geant4, EGSnrc, MCNP, XVMC.
